subsections.title: Overview
subsections.content: The story of creation is found in Genesis 1–2.
points: God created the world in six days and rested on the seventh.
Each day focused on specific parts: light, sky, land, animals, humans.

subsections.title: Introduction
subsections.content: Given to Moses on Mount Sinai as moral laws for the Israelites.
points: Include honoring God, parents, no stealing, no lying.

subsections.title: Methods
subsections.content: Jesus taught through parables, sermons, and examples.
points: Focus on love, forgiveness, humility, and the Kingdom of God.
Examples: The Good Samaritan, Sermon on the Mount.
